name: 張文忠
objective: 本課程介紹生物醫學工程相關之基礎知識，包括:生醫材料、組織工程、生物感測器、生物輸送、生物力學、醫療電子儀器，以及基礎人體結構、生理學等方面之概念。
schedule:
週次    單元主題
1.     Introduction of biomedical engineering
2.     Structures of biomaterials 
3.     Properties of biomaterials
4.     Biocompatibility of biomaterials 
5-6.   Biomedical application of biomaterials
7.     Tissue engineering
8.     Biosensing
9.     Midterm exam
10.    Hemodynamics
11.    Mass transfer in tissue structure
12-13. Biomechanics
14.    Biomedical signal processing
15-17. Final oral presentations 
18.    Final exam
scorePolicy: 期中考: 30% ; 期末考: 40% ; 期末報告及平時表現: 30%
materials:
1. 自編講義.張文忠
2. ”生物醫學材料” 王盈錦主編, 合記出版社.
3. ”醫學工程原理與應用”王正一主編, 正中書局.
4. ”Introduction to Biomedical Engineering”, Enderle et al., Academic Press (2000) 
5. ”Basic Transport Phenomena in Biomedical Engineering” R.L. Fournier, Taylor and Francis,1998, Chapters 5 and 6.
